title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 139.5 - Request of consumer for additional meters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 139.5 - Request of consumer for additional meters

State Regulations

Every electric corporation, gas and electric corporation
and municipality shall install upon the request of a customer as many meters as
such customer shall desire, provided the circuit or circuits connected to each
meter are kept separate from all other circuits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
139.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
